main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified flying objects reported in Thaxton, Virginia during the early 1960s.
interesting points: The reports include observations of floating plasma, a disc-shaped object performing high-speed maneuvers, and phenomena resembling 'angel hair.', The sighting durations varied, with one witness observing an object for about 30 minutes., Witnesses reported feelings of fear and a sense of strangeness during the sightings., One report included an envelope of thistle blooms, suggesting possible physical evidence associated with the sighting., The Air Force acknowledged the sightings and included them in their studies of UFOs.
witness description: Various individuals including a C.P.O., residents of Thaxton, and other local witnesses
